oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Edwina Church of God in Jesus Christ's Name, 2003 June 7
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service led by Jimmy Morrow. Congregants partake in religious singing following a brief sermon. Rayford Dunn preaches to the congregation, and when he takes his seat, other members of the congregation testify. The first part of the recording ends with a brief prayer. The second part of the recording begins with the congregation singing religious songs, giving way to a sermon led by Jimmy Morrow.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern--Religious life and customs; Extemporaneous preaching; Expository preaching; Lay preaching; Pentecostal preaching; Singing--Religious aspects
Dunn, Rayford; Morrow, Jimmy; Smart, Bobby
Edwina Church of God in Jesus Christ's Name (Del Rio, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Church of God in Jesus Christ Name field recordings, 2002-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:rightsHolder: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
